net.bubbaland.gui

Class TearAwayTab

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • javax.swing.JWindow
            • net.bubbaland.gui.TearAwayTab
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer

    public class TearAwayTab
extends javax.swing.JWindow
    A class that allows tabs to be dragged off of a frame. This class provides a drop location when a tab is dragged off a frame by having a window follow the cursor around when not inside of a @TriviaFrame. When a tab is dropped into this, it passes the drop data along to a new TriviaFrame.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
